class,dpso.function,tests.LND7Function
dpso.chromosomelength,1000
dpso.maxallelevalue,100.0
dpso.minallelevalue,-100.0
dpso.numgens,100000
dpso.numinitpop,10
rndgen,7,1
dpso.numthreads,1
dpso.w,0.6
dpso.fp,1.0
dpso.fg,100.0
dpso.neighborhooddistance,10
class,dpso.randomparticlemaker,popt4jlib.PS.DblArray1CMaker
class,dpso.randomvelocitymaker,popt4jlib.PS.DblArray1RandomVelocityMaker
class,dpso.vmover,popt4jlib.PS.DblArray1StdVelocityMaker
class,dpso.c2vadder,popt4jlib.PS.DblArray1ChromosomeVelocityAdder
class,dpso.localoptimizer,popt4jlib.GradientDescent.FletcherConjugateGradientST
fcg.maxiters,1000
fcg.maxbracketingiters,1000
fcg.maxsectioningiters,1000
fcg.gtol,1.e-5
fcg.redrate,5.0
